name: Mona Lisa
snippet: The Mona Lisa is a half-length portrait painting by the Italian Renaissance artist Leonardo da Vinci.

name: Girl with a pearl earring
snippet: Girl with a Pearl Earring is an oil painting by Dutch Golden Age painter Johannes Vermeer.

name: The Starry Night
snippet: The Starry Night is an oil-on-canvas painting by the Dutch Post-Impressionist painter Vincent van Gogh.

name: The Kiss
snippet: The Kiss is an oil painting, with added silver and gold leaf, by the Austrian Symbolist painter Gustav Klimt.
